mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, A.*, E.emp_name from approval A inner join employees E on A.drafter = E.emp_no where A.drafter = #{drafter} order by app_no desc) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from approval where drafter = #{empNo}

select * from ( select rownum rn, A.*, E.emp_name from approval A inner join employees E on A.drafter = E.emp_no where A.drafter = #{drafter} and instr(app_title,#{keyword})>0) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from approval where instr(app_title,#{keyword})>0 and drafter = #{drafter}
select max(app_no) from approval where drafter= #{drafter}
